title: Album, Ideas for Rustic Furniture Proper for Garden Seats, Summer Houses, Hermitages, Cottages & ec., 1838
title_raw: Ideas for Rustic Furniture Proper for Garden Seats, Summer Houses, Hermitages, Cottages & ec.
creditline: Purchase in memory of Miss Caroline F. Anderson
description:
London: M. Taylor, 1, Wellington St., Strand
Has 25 plates
INcludes 1 sheet from an article "Home-made Rustic Work," written by Hollister Sage

Album, Ideas for Rustic Furniture Proper for Garden Seats, Summer Houses, Hermitages, Cottages & ec., 1838.
